description1: With a maximum of 7 questions, you can already make a well-founded assessment of whether a data-driven application qualifies as an AI system or as an impactful algorithm. Fill out the dynamic questionnaire. Soon, additional questionnaires will be available for risk classification of AI systems.
description2: This open-source template is tailored to requirements of the AI Act and Dutch soft law frameworks, such as:
framework2_author: by the Ministry of the Interior and Kingdom Relations
framework3_text: Impact Assessment Human Rights and Algorithms
framework3_author: by the Ministry of the Interior...
